```{r load and clean data}
#read data
fis<-read_csv("/Volumes/lasellshare/Faculty_Staff_Shares$/IR/Surveys/Lasell Internal/First Impressions/2022 Fall/20221013124928-SurveyExport.csv")
```


```{r match ppid}
#fis email
fis<-fis%>%
  rename(email=`Please provide your Lasell email address. This information is needed for research purposes. Your personal information will be kept confidential and will not appear on any report.Â `)%>%
  mutate(email=gsub("@lasell.edu","",fis$email),#remove extra to keep all values the same format
         email=str_to_lower(email))  #lower case

#backup data email
allstu22<-read_excel("/Volumes/lasellshare/Faculty_Staff_Shares$/IR/Registrar Reports/2022 Fall/Fall 2022 UG Backup Data Report.xlsx")%>%
  filter(`Cohort Id`=="2022")%>%#this year's students
  select(`People Code Id`, Name,`Lasell email`)%>%#select all usable vars
  rename(email=`Lasell email`)%>%#match name
  mutate(email=gsub("@lasell.edu","",allstu22$email),#remove extra to match fis emails
         email=str_to_lower(email))#keep lower case format

#merge
fis<-left_join(fis,allstu22)#all fis students that entered a valid email will have a ppid and names now
```
